description: One Piece New World is an upcoming Roblox action-adventure video game based on the One Piece Universe!  Being developed by Snake Productions* and Dawn Adventures, we are working to make the best One Piece game on Roblox! It in short is a massive immersive world where players can adventure and explore, fight and conqueror, or even hunt animals and sell food and equipment! Information on the specifics of the things you'll be able to do in One Piece New World will come soon. But for now, unravel those sails and set out on this adventure with us! One Piece New World is owned by Snake Productions* Â© 2019 All Rights Reserved. Custom Assets and Creations belong to their respective owners. One piece New World is a new design to games bringing a real life aspect to roblox, from a immersive unique combat, to unique life system, custom built lore that changes on the actions you make, and plenty of chances to rise to the top, Yonko? King Of Pirates? Even Warlord; Admiral etc. Its all obtainable, so come ride the waves with us today!
